TopicTitle: The Viper, a dual engine VTOL

Articles.Content:
Been playing around with VTOL's as of late, found that single engines don't give quite enough lift so I moved onto a dual engine design and this is the result.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/JI6fO)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OH2G9NDb5WI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
.
Edit: Added a Mk2 version to the Imgur album. Lifted the wings, added a bay for the landing gear, and added two missiles

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-09T21:05:38Z" title="05/09/2015 09:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 9, 2015</time> by Sigma117**
Updated the OP with a video of the Mk2 (Imgur has more images too). Figured it's better to edit than repost.
